name: 1Bit 1Button PONG
description:
08.04.2021 - Update

I've just uploaded a new version of the game; it includes very small changes which incorporate some feedback received:

  • the sprite of the bar indicates the direction it will move
  • the speed of the ball increase over the time

Unfortunately a known bugs still persist: it may happen that the ball goes outside the play area.

The game has been developed using GDevelop 5 for the 1-Bit Jam hosted by PureNukage.

There were two themes: 1-BIT color palette (black and white) and ONE BUTTON.

The ONLY ONE BUTTON is the left mouse or TOUCH.

To navigate the menu: SHORT PRESS move through menu itmes. LONG PRESS select menu item.

IN PLAY instructions: hold left mouse  or touch to move the bar. The bar moves in one direction (RIGHT) unless in the menu, it has been selected BOTH DIRECTIONS option. In this case, double click (or double tap) to change the direction of the bar (from right to left and viceversa).

Make 3 goals for next level. By taking 3 goals will end the game.

Enjoy
